pr_title: Entity, DAO and Service for Faceted Search Classification

timeline.message:
Entity, DAO and Service for the Faceted Search Classification.

Support create, retrieve, update and delete one Faceted Search Classification,
and retrieve all classifications.

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure if maxResults and orderIndex can be null or not so at the moment I assume they could be null.
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

timeline.bodyText: There are two ways of doing a delete in oEQ. One is calling the delete implemented in GenericDaoImpl with an entity as parameter, and the other one is using Hibernate Query. Both are used in quite a few places.
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

timeline.bodyText: I think there is no need to return dateCreated and dateModified to front-end so I add @JsonIgnore here.
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang

timeline.bodyText: I don't see any need to ignore these - and I can see some cases where it could be useful (such as dateModified indicating currency - unless we have ETags setup).
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: Aren't these redundant? It should be fine to just use the inherited delete, save and merge.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if it'd be better to rely on the enumerate methods provided by GenericInstitutionalDao?
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: I'm surprised this also is provided by one of the base classes, but looks not. However might want to go with the simple getById or findById.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: And although it's not done too often in oEQ, it'd be good to put a JavaDoc on it to say it'll retrieve by id within the current institution.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: For the method names, no need to use Classifications again. It's unnecessarily verbose and is kind of implied on a service dedicated to classifications.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message:
Remove @JsonIgnore from 'dateCreated' and 'dateModified';

In order to make the DAO extend GenericInstitutionDao, this entity needs
full information of an institution. So replace 'institutionId' with an
instance of 'Institution'. The relation should be many-to-one. And when
exporting an institution, there is no need to export the institution
information together with this entity so add '@XStreamOmitField'.

All the basic database related methods are already provided by
GenericInstitutionalDao so remove redundant methods.

Rename names of methods of the 'FacetedSearchClassificationService'.

Add the annotation of Transactional to DML operations.

timeline.bodyText: Sees odd to need to use something called Attachments for this. Normally you'd just use the classloader.getResourceAsStream(<filename>). But maybe this is the oEQ way?
timeline.author: edalex-ian
